name: test_e2e_with_logs[131_LDAP_BLIND_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `LDAP_BLIND_001` |
| **Name** | LDAP blind password enumeration |
| **Category** | LDAP |
| **Subcategory** | blind_injection |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `*)(uid=admin)(password=a*`
- **Encoded**: `*)(uid%3Dadmin)(password%3Da*`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~10000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:30:23.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=LDAP_BLIND_001-1766305823192-nm5rks pattern_id=LDAP_BLIND_001 uri=/?q=*)(uid%3Dadmin)(password%3Da* client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
